channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 08:37 Close the threat of Artobstil to the Bilenkovskaya Territorial Community. Take care of further reports.
item.description: 游릭 08:37 Close the threat of Artobstil to the Bilenkovskaya Territorial Community. Take care of further reports. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游릭 08:31 Driven anxiety in Cherkasy district.Creck on further messages.
